name: Swany Gore Winterfall Mitt - Women's
description: Ski groomed lines at the resort, or chase backcountry epic days. These mitts blend tough soft shell material with leather and waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® to keep your fingers dry and warm.Swany soft shell fabric is windproof, breathable, and water-resistant.GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable inserts.Light, efficient 160 synthetic insulation stays warm even when wet.Leather palm and trim for durability and grip.Pre-curved, rolled construction adds dexterity.Adjustable wrist and cuff drawcord strap seal out snow and drafts.
